summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3859 for the improvement of Newton Street, from 4th Avenue North to Taylor Avenue; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 47190, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
